subject: Re: [junit] Customize Parameterized class report?
msgSnippet: El, There is no such facility in JUnit core right now.  However, if you search the JUnit page on SourceForge for LightweightParameters, you ll find a suggested
messageBody:
El,

There is no such facility in JUnit core right now. However, if you search
the JUnit page on SourceForge for LightweightParameters, you'll find a
suggested patch with a custom runner that does exactly what you're looking
for.

David Safff

On 4/27/07, e.younes <eyounesde@...> wrote:
>
> Hello everybody,
>
> Is it possible to customize the output reports from tests running with
> @RunWith(value=Parameterized.class)
>
> For example instead of [0], [1] ,[2], [3].
> Getting the names of the input parameters.
>
>
> Thanks.
>
> El Moumen
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
